name: Feeding Frenzy (itch)
description:
Five minutes of furious fishing.

Load up your livewell with lunkers.

INTRUCTIONS

Press the touchpad to begin a game.

Press and hold trigger to "hold" your tackle at it's current distance from the rod tip.

Release trigger when tackle is in motion to cast or yank.

Press the touchpad to lock the reel at the current distance.

Press the touchpad when locked to auto-retrieve the tackle.

When the rod turns red the fish are biting. Set the hook by quickly pointing straight up.

Drop fish into livewell to add it's weight to your total.

Adjust dock elevation by holding menu button and pointing up or down.
